items.content_html: Secure Chat is a real-time, end-to-end encrypted messaging app where users can create or join password-protected rooms. Built with React, Node.js, and Socket.IO, it encrypts messages client-side before sending. Lightweight, fast, and deployable for private communication.

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client.
